items.text: good length on middle, defended
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, no run
Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: short, outside off, ducked
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Perera, no run

items.text: short, ducks as the ball goes over middle and leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Perera, no run

items.text: full on off, driven to mid-off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, no run

items.text: shortish, cuts in late to beat Chandimal's flashing blade
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, no run

items.text: rips in prdigiously and hits the pad. Huge shout for lbw but that was missing leg given the sharp angle
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, 1 leg bye

items.text: short ball, Thisara shapes up to pull but the ball jags away after pitching and as a result Thisara is forced to fetch it and skews it in the air off the bottom of the bat. Midwicket settles under it
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Perera, OUT

dismissal.text: NLTC Perera c Tamim Iqbal b Rubel Hossain 2 (10b 0x4 0x6) SR: 20.00

items.text: chops this back of a length delivery as he tries to force a slap close to off and sets off for a run. Beats the throw to make the non-striker's end as fine leg runs in and hurls a throw
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: cuts in from a length and Gunaratne turns it away to square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Gunaratne, 1 run

items.text: jags away considerably from a good length and beats the outside edge as he sticks the bat out
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunaratne, no run

items.text: walks a long way across and exposes all three stumps. Gets a cross-seaming length ball that pitches outside leg, angles away and bounces over the stumps. That was a comedic sequence of events
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunaratne, no run

items.text: good length, pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunaratne, no run

items.text: back-of-the-hand slower ball, short of a length, opens the face for a drop to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunaratne, 1 run

items.text: short, wide, another back-of-the-hand slower one, chops a cut to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, no run

items.text: short of a length, pitched outside leg, flicked to deep fine leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: length ball angling into off and middle, clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, no run

items.text: short on off stump, pulled to the right of the diving midwicket fielder and they pick up two by the time deep square leg runs around to cut it off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length close to off stump, punched to short extra-cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, no run

items.text: length ball on off stump, punched to the right of short extra, and long-off comes in off the boundary to stop it
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: fullish outside off, a bit of off-cut on it, defended into the point region
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Gunaratne, no run

items.text: fullish outside off, once again gets forward and defends towards point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Gunaratne, no run

items.text: length ball angling across to off stump, and they pick up the single after Shakib sprints in from extra-cover, throws himself forward, tries the pick-up-and-scoop to the bowler's end, but fails to collect the ball cleanly. He's still down on the floor. Wonder if he's landed awkwardly and hurt himself in some way
items.postText: The physio's come onto the field. He might have landed badly on his bowling hand here. He's going off the field. Nasir Hossain will sub for him.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: full on leg stump, clipped to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunaratne, 1 run

items.text: length ball slanting across to off stump, defended punchily into the covers
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, no run
